docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Oct. 18 --With the exception of the opening session, 250 seats have been set aside for the general public at all meetings of the United Nations General Assembly at Flushing, it was announced here today.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Oct. 19 --Bad weather overseas for the last two days has delayed the arrival by air of United Nations delegates to the General Assembly. The peak of arrivals will be reached at La Guardia Field tomorrow and Monday.

docs.snippet: The General Assembly of the United Nations will meet at the old World's Fair grounds at Flushing on Wednesday, and already the pattern of critical attack and defense of the U.N. has been established.
